anya-e0807n5:2: Kriyaṁ ācikkhatīti ākhyātanti kriyāpadassa pubbācariyasaññā. Kāla+kāraka+purisaparidīpakaṁ kriyālakkhaṇaṁ tyādyantaṁ aliṅgañca, vuttampi ce+taṁ –
anya-e0807n5:6_0: Ca sabbattha vattate. Kriyā attho etassāti kriyattho dhātu, so ca duvidho sakammakā+kammakavasena.
anya-e0807n5:6_1: Tattha yasmiṁ kriyatthe kattuvācimhā kammaṁ gavesīyate, so sakammako. Itaro akammako.
anya-e0807n5:7_0: Tatra sakammakā kammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā kaṭaṁ karoti, gāmaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0807n5:7_1: odanaṁ pacati. Akammakā kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā acchati seti tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0807n5:7_2: Kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattari kamme vā patiṭṭhito kārakasamūhasādhiyo
anya-e0807n5:10: Kara+bhūdhātūhi karaṇañca bhavanañca vuccati, pāka+gamanādīhi tesaṁ kriyābhavanānaṁ vāccattaṁ kathaṁ bhavatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Punapi –
anya-e0807n5:14: Kāriyarūpā hi dhātvatthā, sattāyuttā ca te+khilā;
anya-e0807n5:15: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṁ tesu gamyate.
anya-e0807n5:16: 1. Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0807n5:17: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti. Kriyādhikārattā ‘‘kriyatthā’’ti vuttaṁ. Tesa+maniyame –
anya-e0807n5:19_0: Ekānekesu tumhaamhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:19_1: paracchakkānañca majjhimu+ttama+paṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṁ. Tatthati antīti
anya-e0807n5:19_2: paṭhamapuriso, ādo niddiṭṭhattā. Si tha iti majjhimapuriso, majjhe niddiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0807n5:19_3: Mi ma iti uttamapuriso. Uttamasaddo+yaṁ sabhāvato tipabhutīna+manta+māha. Paracchakkepi
anya-e0807n5:19_4: te antetiādinā evaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Evaṁ sesesu bhavissatiādīsu sattasu paccayavidhānasuttesupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:20_0: Idāni bhūvādīna+maṭṭhagaṇānaṁ bhūvādigaṇesu bhū=sattāya+miti paṭhamadhātuto parā
anya-e0807n5:20_1: tyādayo yojīyante. Tattha ‘‘ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṁ’’ti tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattu+kamma+bhāvesuyeva
anya-e0807n5:20_3: lo’’ iccādinā tesaṁ vikaraṇānaṁ vidhānā tyādayo kattu+kamma+bhāvesveva viññāyantīti
anya-e0807n5:22: Nissāya paccayā honti, ete vikaraṇā siyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:24: Ivaṇṇu+vaṇṇantānaṁ kriyattānaṁ e+o honti yathākkamaṁ paccayeti ūsso+kāro.
anya-e0807n5:26: Sare pare eona+mayavā honti yathākkamaṁti ossa avādeso. So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā itthī sādhu bhavati, cittaṁ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0807n5:27: Uttattā kattu ākhyāte, tatiyā na ca kattari;
anya-e0807n5:29: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṁ bahuttā ‘‘bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṁ’’ti anti.
anya-e0807n5:31_0: Vikaraṇānaṁ kvaci lopo hotīti lavikaraṇassa lopo, sesaṁ purimasadisaṁ. Te purisā
anya-e0807n5:31_1: bhavanti. Majjhimapuri- sekavacanaṁ si, tvaṁ bhavasi. Bahuvacanaṁ thapaccayo, tumhe
anya-e0807n5:33_0: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Ahaṁ bhavāmi. Bahuvacanaṁ mapaccayo, mayaṁ bhavāma.
anya-e0807n5:33_1: Evaṁ paracchekkepi-bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase, bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavamhe. Keci dīghaṁ
anya-e0807n5:40_0: Paca=pāke, akāro uccāraṇattho, eva+muparipi. Paca iti ṭhite lavikaraṇaṁ, vikaraṇalopādi
anya-e0807n5:40_1: purimasamaṁ. So odanaṁ pacati, te pacanti. Tvaṁ pacasi, tumhe pacatha. Ahaṁ pacāmi,
anya-e0807n5:40_2: mayaṁ pacāma. Paracchakke-pacate, pacante. Pacase, pacavhe. Pace, pacāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:42_1: ekattha pasaṅge majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṁ thapaccayo. So ca pacati, tvañca pacasi,
anya-e0807n5:42_2: tumhe pacatha. Tulyabalavirodhino hi vippaṭisedhā paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:42_3: tiṇṇaṁ ekattha pasaṅge uttamapurisabahuvacanaṁ hoti, so ca pacati, tvañca pacasi,
anya-e0807n5:45: Etesaṁ dhātūnaṁ cchaṅa vā hoti nta+māna+tyādīsu. So gāmaṁ gacchati. Anti –
anya-e0807n5:47: Garupubbasmā rassā nte+ntīnaṁ re vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:52_0: Gacchare gacchanti. Tvaṁ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṁ gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāma.
anya-e0807n5:52_1: Cchādesābhāvapakkhe ‘‘ū lasse’’ti ekāre gameti. Paralope gamenti. Gamesi, gametha.
anya-e0807n5:52_2: Gamemi, gamema. Paracchakkepi so gacchate, gacchare gacchante. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:53: Pure adhammo dibbati, purā marāmīti ca taṁsamīpe tabbohārūpacārena vattamānavacanaṁ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n5:61_0: Pure+purāsaddehi vā anāgatatā gamyate, tadā tassa vattamānattā. Kālabyattayo vā eso,
anya-e0807n5:61_1: bhavantyeva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā ‘‘santesu parigūhāmi’’ ‘‘kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0807n5:61_3: nu tvaṁ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī’’tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:62: 5,175. Gama vada dānaṁ ghamma vajja dajjā
anya-e0807n5:63: Gamādīnaṁ ghammādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:67: Vuttattā akammakato kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:69_0: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu māna+nta+tyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā.
anya-e0807n5:71: Ākhyātena avuttattā, kattuto tatiyā na tu;
anya-e0807n5:73: Anubhūyanti sampattiyo tayā. Anubhūyasi tvaṁ devadattena. Anubhūyatha tumhe. Ahaṁ anubhūyāmi, tayā mayaṁ anubhūyāma. Dvitte anubhuyyati+ccādi. Evaṁ paracchakke.
anya-e0807n5:74: Bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassa ekattā ekavacanameva. Tañca paṭhamapurisekavacaneyeva sambhavati, neva+ññaṁ, bahulaṁvidhānā. Bhūyati bhūyate devadattena, sampati bhavanantyattho.
anya-e0807n5:77_0: Kriyatthā kyassa īña vā hoti. Ño ādyāvayavattho. Devadattena odano pacīyati paccati,
anya-e0807n5:77_1: reādese odanā pacīyare pacīyanti, paccare paccanti. Cavaggapubbarūpāni. Tvaṁ pacīyasi
anya-e0807n5:77_2: paccasi, tumhe pacīyatha paccatha. Ahaṁ pacīyāmi paccāmi, mayaṁ pacīyāma paccāma.
anya-e0807n5:78_0: Gamito kamme cchaṅa ca īñaāgame ca kate tena gāmo gacchīyati, gāmā gacchīyanti. Gacchīyasi,
anya-e0807n5:78_1: gacchīyatha. Gacchīyāmi, gacchīyāma. Evaṁ paracchakke. Gamīyati gammati, gamīyanti
anya-e0807n5:78_2: gammanti. Gamīyasi gammasi, gamīyatha gammatha, gamīyāmi gammāmi, gamīyāma gammāma
anya-e0807n5:78_3: paracchakkepi evaṁ. Tathā ghammīyati, ghammīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:81: Tathā hi vijjamānassāpi kammāssa avacanicchāyaṁ idaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0807n5:82: Satopi na vivakkhā+ssa, asatopi ca sā bhave;
anya-e0807n5:87: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssati ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṁ ssāmhe
anya-e0807n5:88: Bhavissati=anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:90_0: Kriyatthā paresaṁ aādīnaṁ īādīnaṁ ssādīnañca byañjanassi+ña hoti vibhāsā. Vavatthitavibhāsā+yaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:90_1: Sseti ssādīnaṁ ssatiādīnañcāvayavo gahito, ‘‘ūbyañjanassā’’ti siddhepi tyādīsu etesamevāti
anya-e0807n5:90_2: niyamattho+ya+mārambho. Lassākāralope o+avādese bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi,
anya-e0807n5:90_3: bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate, bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe.
anya-e0807n5:93_0: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse. Sukhaṁ tayā anubhavissati, anubhavissanti. Anubhavissasi,
anya-e0807n5:93_1: anubhavissatha. Anubhavissāmi, anubhavissāma. Aññatra anubhūyissati, anubhūyissanti
anya-e0807n5:94: Kattari-pacissati, pacissanti iccādi. Kamme-pacissati odano devadattena, pacīyissati, paccissati. Paccissanti odanā pacīyissanti, pacīyissare, paccissare, paccissanti.
anya-e0807n5:95_0: Gamito kattari-so gacchissati, te gacchissanti. Tvaṁ gacchissasi, tumhe gacchissatha.
anya-e0807n5:95_1: Ahaṁ gacchissāmi, mayaṁ gacchissāma. Gacchissate, gacchissante. Gacchissase, gacchissavhe.
anya-e0807n5:95_2: Gacchissaṁ, gacchissāmhe. Saggaṁ gamissati, gamissanti. Gamissasi, gamissatha. Gamissāmi,
anya-e0807n5:95_3: gamissāma iccādi. Kamme-gacchiyissati, gacchiyissanti iccādi. Kyalope gamissati,
anya-e0807n5:95_4: gamissanti iccādi. Tathā ghammissati ghammīyissati, ghammissanti, ghammīyissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:97_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṁ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti. Ime hi nāma
anya-e0807n5:97_1: kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti. Ettha ‘‘jyādīhi knā’’ti knāvikaraṇe ‘‘ñāssane jā’’ti
anya-e0807n5:97_2: jādeso. Na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā bhavissati. Kathañhi
anya-e0807n5:97_3: nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṁ kuṭikaṁ karissati. Vimhaye-acchariyaṁ
anya-e0807n5:97_4: vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti, yatra
anya-e0807n5:97_5: hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni
anya-e0807n5:97_6: neva dakkhiti, na pana saddaṁ sossati. Acchariyaṁ andho nāma pabbata+mārohissati,
anya-e0807n5:98: 4. Bhūte ī uṁ o ttha iṁ mhā ā ū se vhaṁ a mhe
anya-e0807n5:99: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā īādayo honti. Bhūtānajjatane upari vakkhamānattā ime īādayo bhūtajjatane. ‘‘Suvo ahosi ānando’’tiādīsu bhūtasāmaññeva bhavanti.
anya-e0807n5:105: Āādo īādo ssādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hotīti dhātuto pubbaṁ aña. ‘‘Kattari lo’’ti lo, ekāra+avādesā ca.
anya-e0807n5:107: Eyyāthādīnaṁ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṁti īssattho, abhavittho, bhavittho, abhavattho, bhavattho. ‘‘Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā’’ti īssa rassattaṁ. So abhavi bhavi, abhavī bhavī.
anya-e0807n5:109: Tiuṁssa iṁsu+aṁsu vā honti. Abhaviṁsu bhaviṁsu, abhavaṁsu bhavaṁsu, abhavuṁ bhavuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:111: Ossa aādayo vā honti. Abhava bhava, abhavi bhavi, iñāgame abhavittha bhavittha, abhavattha bhavattha, abhavittho bhavittho, abhavattho bhavattho.
anya-e0807n5:113: Ossa si vā hoti. Abhavisi bhavisi, abhavasi bhavasi. Abhavo bhavo.
anya-e0807n5:115: Esaṁ uña vā hoti. Īādisambandhīnameva gahaṇaṁ. Abhavuttha bhavuttha.
anya-e0807n5:117_0: Iṁssa ca siña vā hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṁ. Ikāraññakārā uccāraṇaādyāvayavatthā.
anya-e0807n5:117_1: Abhavasittha bhavasittha, abhavittha bhavittha, abhavattha bhavattha, abhavisiṁ bhavisiṁ,
anya-e0807n5:117_2: abhavasiṁ bhavasiṁ, abhaviṁ bhaviṁ. Uñāgame āssa rasso. Abhavumha bhavumha abhavumhā
anya-e0807n5:117_3: bhavumhā. Siñāgame abhavasimha bhavasimha abhavasimhā bhavasimhā abhavimha bhavimha
anya-e0807n5:117_4: abhavimhā bhavimhā abhavamha bhavamha abhavamhā bhavamhā. Paracchakke – ‘‘eyyāthā’’dinā
anya-e0807n5:117_5: tthe abhavittha bhavittha abhavattha bhavattha. Rasse abhavatha bhavatha, abhavā
anya-e0807n5:117_6: bhavā, abhavu bhavu. Abhavise bhavise, abhavase bhavase, abhavivhaṁ bhavivhaṁ abhavavhaṁ
anya-e0807n5:117_7: bhavavhaṁ, assa a+mādese abhavaṁ bhavaṁ abhava bhava, abhavimhe bhavimhe abhavamhe
anya-e0807n5:117_8: bhavamhe. Kamme sukhaṁ tayā anubhūyittho anvabhūyattho anubhūyattho anvabhūsi anubhūsī
anya-e0807n5:117_9: anvabhūyī anubhūyī, anvabhūyiṁsu anubhūyiṁsu anvabhūyaṁsu anubhūyaṁsu anvabhūyuṁ
anya-e0807n5:117_10: anubhūyuṁ iccādi. Bhāve-tena abhūyittho bhūyittho abhūyattho bhūyattho abhūyi bhūyi
anya-e0807n5:117_11: abhūyī bhūyī. Tena abhūyattha bhūyattha abhūya bhūya abhūyā bhūyā.
anya-e0807n5:118_0: So apacittho pacittho iccādi kattusamaṁ. Kamme-apacīyittho pacīyittho apacīyattho
anya-e0807n5:118_1: pacīyattho. Cavaggapubba- rūpe apaccittho paccittho apaccattho paccattho apacīyi
anya-e0807n5:118_2: pacīyi apacīyī pacīyī apacci pacci apaccī paccī, apacīyiṁsu pacīyiṁsu apaciṁsu paciṁsu
anya-e0807n5:118_3: apacīyaṁsu pacīyaṁsu apaccaṁsu paccaṁsu apacīyuṁ pacīyuṁ apaccuṁ paccuṁ iccādi kattusamaṁ, pubbarūpova viseso.
anya-e0807n5:119: So gāmaṁ agacchittho gacchittho iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:121: Ḍaṁsassa ca gamissa ca ñchaṅa vā hoti ā+īādīsu. Agañchittho gañchittho agañchattho gañchattho agañchi gañchi agañchī gañchī iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:123_0: Āādo īādo ca gamissa ā hoti vā. So agā agami gami agamittho gamittho agamattho gamattho.
anya-e0807n5:123_2: īssā’’ti īssa siādeso, agamāsi agami gami agamī gamī, agamiṁsu gamiṁsu agamaṁsu gamaṁsu
anya-e0807n5:123_3: agamuṁ gamuṁ. Ossa aādese ajjhaguṁ. Tvaṁ ajjhagā parassa lopo. Tumhe ajjhaguttha.
anya-e0807n5:123_4: Ahaṁ ajjhagaṁ, mayaṁ ajjhagamha. Paracchakke – ‘‘eyyāthā’’dinā tthe so agacchittha
anya-e0807n5:123_5: gacchittha agañchittha gañchittha agamittha gamittha agama gama agamā gamā. Te agamū
anya-e0807n5:123_6: gamū, ossa āādese ajjhaguṁ. Tvaṁ agamise gamise. Tumhe agamivhaṁ. ‘‘Eyyāthā’’ dinā
anya-e0807n5:123_7: a+mādese ahaṁ agamaṁ gamaṁ ajjhagaṁ. Mayaṁ agamimhe gamimhe. Kammeagacchīyi agamīyi,
anya-e0807n5:123_8: agacchiyuṁ agamiyuṁ iccādi. Tathā aghammī ghammī iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:125_0: Māyoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti. Sakakālato kālantarepi paccayavidhānattho+yaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:125_1: Mā bhavaṁ abhavittho iccādi. Vāvidhānāssatyādi+eyyādi+tvādayopi honti, mā bhavaṁ
anya-e0807n5:125_2: bhavissati, mā bhavaṁ bhaveyya, mā bhavaṁ bhavatu iccādi. (Īādipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:126: 5. Anajjatane ā ūo ttha a mhā ttha tthuṁ se vhaṁ iṁ mhase
anya-e0807n5:127_0: Avijjamānajjatane bhūtatthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti vā. ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā
anya-e0807n5:127_1: tthe ‘‘ā ī ū mhā’’ iccādinā rasse ca so abhavattha bhavattha abhava bhava abhavā
anya-e0807n5:127_2: bhavā, te abhavu bhavu abhavū bhavū. O, ‘‘ossā’’tiādinā aādayo, abhava bhava abhavi
anya-e0807n5:127_3: bhavi abhavattha bhavattha abhavattho bhavattho, siādese abhavasi bhavasi abhavo
anya-e0807n5:127_4: bhavo. Tumhe abhavattha bhavattha. Ahaṁ abhavaṁ bhavaṁ abhava bhava, mayaṁ abhavamha
anya-e0807n5:127_5: bhavamha abhavamhā bhavamhā. So abhavattha bhavattha. Te abhavatthuṁ bhavatthuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:127_6: Tvaṁ abhavase bhavase. Tumhe abhavavhaṁ bhavavhaṁ. ‘‘Issa ca siña’’ti siṁ, ahaṁ abhavasiṁ
anya-e0807n5:127_7: bhavasiṁ abhaviṁ bhaviṁ. Mayaṁ abhavamhase bhavamhase. Kamme-tthe sukhaṁ tayā anubhūyittha,
anya-e0807n5:127_8: iñāgamābhāve anubhūyattha iccādi. Bhāve-abhūyattha bhūyattha iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:128_0: So odanaṁ apacattha pacattha iccādi kattusamaṁ. Kamme-apacīyattha pacīyattha apaccattha
anya-e0807n5:128_1: paccattha apacīya pacīya apacīyā pacīyā apacca pacca apaccā paccā. Apacīyu pacīyu
anya-e0807n5:128_2: apacīyū pacīyū apaccu paccu apaccū paccū iccādi. ‘‘Māyoge ī+āādī’’ti māyogepi āādayo,
anya-e0807n5:129: Tathā agacchattha gacchattha iccādi purimasamaṁ. Tathā agamattha gamattha iccādipi aghammattha ghammattha iccādipi. (Anajjatanapaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:130: 6. Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe
anya-e0807n5:131: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane vattamānato kriyatthā aādayo honti. Akkhānaṁ=indriyānaṁ paraṁ parokkhaṁ. Tasmiṁ. ‘‘Aparokkhesū’’ti vacanā kya+lādivikaraṇā na honti.
anya-e0807n5:133: Parokkhāyaṁ paṭhama+mekassaraṁ saddarūpaṁ dve bhavati. ‘‘Bhūssa vuka’’ itiādīsu vuka, bhūva bhūva iti dvitte –
anya-e0807n5:135: Dvitte pubbassa ādito+ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:137: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti.
anya-e0807n5:139_0: Dvitte pubbesaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathākkamaṁti bakāre so babhūva
anya-e0807n5:139_1: kira, te babhuvu kira. Tvaṁ babhuve kira, iña tumhe babhuvittha kira. Ahaṁ babhuva
anya-e0807n5:139_2: kira, mayaṁ babhuvimha kira. So babhuvittha kira, te babhuvire kira. Tvaṁ babhuvittho
anya-e0807n5:139_3: kira, tumhe babhuvivho kira. Ahaṁ babhuvi kira, mayaṁ babhuvimhe kira. Kamme-anupabhuva
anya-e0807n5:140_0: Papaca, papacu. Papace, iñāgame papacittha. Aññatra ‘‘saṁyogādilopo’’ti lopo, papacittha.
anya-e0807n5:140_1: Papaca, papacimha. Papacittha, papacire. Papacittho papacitho, papacivho. Papaci,
anya-e0807n5:141_0: Aādipaccaye dvibhāve anādibyañjanalope pubbassa ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’’ti cavaggajakāre
anya-e0807n5:141_1: ‘‘byañjane dīgharassā’’ti dīghe ca kate so gāmaṁ jagāma kira, jagamu. Jagame, jagamittha.
anya-e0807n5:141_2: Jagama, jagamimha. Jagamittha, jagamire. Jagamittho, jagamivho. Jagami, jagamimhe. Evaṁ kamme.
anya-e0807n5:142_1: phalenā+numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto. Tena uttamavisayepi payogasambhavo. (Parokkhāpaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:143: 7. Yyodo vā+tipattiyaṁ ssā ssaṁsu sse ssatha ssaṁ ssamhā ssatha ssiṁsussasessavhessiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0807n5:144_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṁ ssādayo honti. Vidhurapaccayopanipātato kāraṇavekallato
anya-e0807n5:144_1: vā kriyātipatana+manipphatti kriyātipatti. Ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyā atītānāgatesveva
anya-e0807n5:144_2: honti, na vattamāne, tatra kriyātipatyasambhavā. Iñāgame ssāssa vā rasse ca sace
anya-e0807n5:144_3: so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṁ alabhissa, arahā abhavissa bhavissa abhavissā bhavissā vā,
anya-e0807n5:144_4: te ca taṁ alabhissaṁsu, arahanto abhavissaṁsu bhavissaṁsu. ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā ssessa
anya-e0807n5:144_5: vā akāre tvaṁ abhavissa bhavisse. Tumhe abhavissatha. Ahaṁ abhavissaṁ. Rasse mayaṁ
anya-e0807n5:144_6: abhavissamha bhavissamha abhavissamhā bhavissamhā. Paracchakke-so abhavissatha, abhavissiṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:145: Kamme-tena sukhaṁ anvabhavissa, anvabhavissaṁsu kyalopo. Anvabhūyissa anvabhūyissā iccādi. Bhāve-tena abhūyissa bhūyissa abhūyissā bhūyissā. Abhūyissatha bhūyissatha.
anya-e0807n5:146_0: Evaṁ taṇḍulādisādhanaṁ alabhissa, odanaṁ apacissa pacissa iccādi. Kamme-tena odano
anya-e0807n5:146_1: apacissa pacissa apacissā pacissā apacīyissa pacīyissa apacīyissā pacīyissā apaccissa
anya-e0807n5:147_0: So agacchissa gacchissa agacchissā gacchissā iccādi. Cchādesā+bhāve agamissa gamissa
anya-e0807n5:147_1: agamissā gamissā iccādi. Kamme-agacchissa gacchissa agacchīyissa iccādi. Agamissa
anya-e0807n5:147_2: gamissa agamīyissa iccādi. Tathā aghammissa iccādi. (Kriyātipattipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:148: 8. Hetuphalesve+yya eyyuṁ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṁ etho eyyāvho eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:149: Hetubhūtāyaṁ phalabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṁ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā. Lavikaraṇavuddhiādi pubbasamaṁ. Parikappe –
anya-e0807n5:151: Eyya+eyyāsi+eyya+miccesa+me vā hoti. So dāni kinnu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya.
anya-e0807n5:153_0: Eyyu+miccassa ñuṁ vā hoti. Sace saṁkhārā niccā bhavuṁ bhaveyyuṁ, na nirujjheyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:153_1: Yadi tvaṁ bhave bhaveyyāsi. ‘‘Eyyāthā’’ dinā assa okāre tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha
anya-e0807n5:155_0: Eyyāmassa emu vā hoti u ca. Kinnu kho mayaṁ bhavemu bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma. Paracchakke-bhavetha,
anya-e0807n5:155_1: bhaveraṁ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho. Bhave bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe. Kamme-sukhaṁ tayā
anya-e0807n5:155_2: anubhuyye anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyuṁ anubhūyeyyuṁ. Tena tvaṁ anubhūye anubhūyeyyāsi,
anya-e0807n5:155_3: tumhe anubhūyeyyātho anubhūyeyyātha. Tenā+haṁ anubhūyeyyāmi, mayaṁ anubhūyemu anubhūyeyyāmu
anya-e0807n5:155_4: anubhūyeyyāma. Paracchakke-anubhūyetha iccādi. Bhāve-bhūye bhūyeyya bhūyetha.
anya-e0807n5:156: Vidhimhi-so odanaṁ pace paceyya iccādi. Kamme-pacīye pacīyeyya pacce pacceyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:157: Anumatiyaṁ-so gāmaṁ gacche gaccheyya iccādi. Aññatra game gameyya iccādi. Tathā ghamme ghammeyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:158: Pāto paceyya ce bhuñje, icce+ttha pacanakriyā;
anya-e0807n5:161: Sattiyaṁ arahate ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti. Bhavaṁ khalu pattaṁ paceyya, bhavaṁ satto, bhavaṁ araho.
anya-e0807n5:163_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā. Api bhavaṁ gilitaṁ
anya-e0807n5:163_1: pāsāṇaṁ paceyya udaragginā, sambhāvemi saddahāmi bhavaṁ paceyya, bhavaṁ pacissati, bhavaṁ apaci.
anya-e0807n5:167: Patthanā, bhattiyā vā+tha, na vā byāpāraṇā vidhi.
anya-e0807n5:168: Pañhe-kiṁ so bhattaṁ paceyya, udāhu byañjanaṁ. Patthanāyaṁ-aho vata so paceyya ce. Vidhimhi-bhavaṁ pattaṁ paceyya. (Eyyādipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:169: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṁ antaṁ ssu vho e āmase
anya-e0807n5:170: Pañhapatthanāvidhisve+te honti kriyatthato. Āsiṁsanatthe-so sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0807n5:172_0: Ato parassa hissa vā lopo hoti. Tvaṁ sukhī bhava bhavāhi, himhi dīgho. ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā
anya-e0807n5:172_1: vhoka, tumhe sukhitā bhavathavho bhavatha. Ahaṁ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṁ sukhino bhavāma.
anya-e0807n5:172_2: Paracchakke-tathā bhavataṁ, bhavantaṁ. Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave bhavāmase. Kamme-tayā
anya-e0807n5:173_0: Āṇattiyaṁ-devadatto dāni odanaṁ pacatu, pacantu iccādi. Kamme-tena odano paccatu
anya-e0807n5:173_1: iccādi. Tathā so gāmaṁ gacchatu iccādi. ‘‘Ū lasse’’ti lasse+kāre gametu, gamentu
anya-e0807n5:173_2: iccādi. Ghammādese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi. Kamme-gacchīyatu iccādi. Tathā gamīyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:174: Vidhimhi-lassa lope lutte vuddhi, idha pabbato hotu.
anya-e0807n5:175_0: Nimantane-adhivāsetha tumhe bhante bhagavā bhojanaṁ, vasatissa ‘‘curādito ṇī’’ti
anya-e0807n5:175_1: ṇimhi ‘‘assā ṇānubandhe’’ti ā, ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye’’ti e ca hoti. Idha nissīdatu
anya-e0807n5:175_2: bhavaṁ, sadassa ‘‘jara+sadāna+mīma vā’’ti īma, manubandhattā antasarato īma.
anya-e0807n5:176: Ajjhesane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ, ettha curādittā purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:177: Anumatiyaṁ-puccha vāsava maṁ pañhaṁ, pavisatu bhavaṁ. Ettha pucchato hissa lopo. Evaṁ nisīda.
anya-e0807n5:178: Patthanā=yācanā, tatra-dada=dāne, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, dāto lassa ekāre ca ekaṁ me nayanaṁ dehi.
anya-e0807n5:179: Pattakāle-sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ. Ettha ‘‘tanāditvo’’ti o.
anya-e0807n5:183_0: Etesaṁ vā cchaṅa hotinta+māna+tyādīsu. So saggaṁ gacchati gameti, gacchanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:183_1: Kamme-gacchīyati gamīyati iccādi. Yama=uparame, parokkhāanajjatanarūpāni sabbattha
anya-e0807n5:183_2: payoga+manugamma yojetabbāni. Nipubbo, niyacchati niyamati, niyacchanti niyamanti.
anya-e0807n5:183_3: Saṁpubbo, ‘‘ye saṁssā’’ti ññattaṁ, saññamati, saññamanti. Kamme-niyacchīyati niyamīyati
anya-e0807n5:183_4: niyammati, saññamīyati vā. Tathā niyacchissati, saññamissati. Niyacchi, saṁyami.
anya-e0807n5:183_5: Niyacchissa, saṁyamissa. Niyaccheyya, saṁyameyya. Niyacchatu, saññamatu. Isa+siṁsa=icchāyaṁ,
anya-e0807n5:183_6: so saggaṁ icchati, icchanti iccādi. ‘‘Lahussupantassā’’ti vuddhimhi esati, esanti
anya-e0807n5:183_7: iccādi. Kamme-icchīyati, ‘‘vā kvacī’’ti vuddhimhi esīyati. Pubbarūpe issati issate
anya-e0807n5:183_8: iccādi. Icchissati esissati iccādi. Icchi esi. Icchissa esissa. Iccheyya eseyya.
anya-e0807n5:183_9: Icchatu esatu iccādi. Āsa=upavesane, so āsane acchati iccādi. ‘‘Byañjane dīgharassā’’ti
anya-e0807n5:183_10: rasso, upapubbo, tathā upāsati. Acchissati upāsissati. Acchi upāsi. Acchissa upāsissa.
anya-e0807n5:183_11: Accheyya upāseyya. Acchatu upāsatu iccādi. Disa=pekkhane, dicchati dicchanti iccādi
anya-e0807n5:183_12: sabbaṁ purimasamaṁ. Labha=lābhe, ito paraṁ visesaṭṭhānamevavakkhāma, sabbavāro vuttānusārena
anya-e0807n5:183_13: gahetabbo. Labhati, labhanti iccādi. Kamme-kyassa pubbarūpādimhi kate labbhati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:185: Labhasmā iṁ īnaṁ thaṁ+thā vā honti. So alabhittha labhittha alabhi labhi iṁ paccaye alatthaṁ alabhiṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:187_0: Labhādīnaṁ cchaṅa hoti ssena saha. Lacchati labhissati, lacchanti labhissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:187_1: Kriyātipattiyaṁ ssābhāgassa cchaṅādese alacchā alabhissa iccādi. Vasa=nivāse, vacchati
anya-e0807n5:187_2: vasissati. Kamme-bahulādhikārā ‘‘assū’’ti ukāro , pubbarūpe vussati vussissati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:187_3: Tathā avacchā avasissā. Chida=dvedhākaraṇe, checchati chindissati, ‘‘mañca rudhādīnaṁ’’ti
anya-e0807n5:187_4: maṁ lo ca. Lassa lopo ca. Bhida=vidāraṇe, bhecchati bhindissati. Abhecchā abhindissā.
anya-e0807n5:187_5: Ruda=rodane, rucchati rodissati. Arucchā arodissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:188_0: Aññapaccayepi chidassa ‘‘cchaṅa’’ iti yogavibhāgā cchaṅa, bhūte ūṁ paccaye acchecchuṁ
anya-e0807n5:188_1: acchindiṁsu. Vuttato aññadhātūnañca, gama=gamane, gacchaṁ gacchissaṁ. Aññapaccayepi
anya-e0807n5:188_2: vaca=byattavacane iccādi, kamme-bahulādhikārā tyādīsu parabhūtesupi yathāgamaṁ vacādīnañcassa
anya-e0807n5:188_3: ‘‘vacādīnaṁ vassuṭa vā’’ti kamme uṭa ca ‘‘assū’’ti assa u ca, tena dhammo uccati
anya-e0807n5:188_4: vuccati, vuccanti iccādi, yassa ca pubbarūpaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:190: Bhujādīnaṁ kkhaṅa hoti ssena saha. Vakkhati vacissati, vakkhanti vacissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:192_0: Īādīsu vacassa oma hoti. Makārānubandhattā ‘‘mānubandho sarāna+mantā paro’’ti paribhāsato
anya-e0807n5:192_1: sarā paro. Avoci, avocuṁ, avoco iccādi. Anajjatane-avaca avacā vacā iccādi. Kriyātipattiyaṁ-avakkhā
anya-e0807n5:192_2: avacissā, avakkhiṁsu avacissiṁsu iccādi. Vaceyya iccādi. Kamme-vucceyya iccādi. Tathā
anya-e0807n5:194: Kusa=akkose, āpubbo, tassa rasso ca, akkosati iccādi ñeyyaṁ, lavikaraṇalopavuddhiyo.
anya-e0807n5:196: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti. Pararūpapaṭhamakkharāni, akkocchi akkosi iccādi. Abhipubbo ruha=rohane, abhirucchi abhiruhi iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:197_0: Vaha=pāpuṇane, vahati, vahanti. Kamme-kye ‘‘hassa vipallāso’’ti vipariyāso, tena
anya-e0807n5:197_1: so vuyhati, ‘‘assū’’ti uttaṁ. Vahissati, vuyhissati. Avahi, avuyhittha, avuhi. Avahissā,
anya-e0807n5:197_2: vuyhīssā iccādi. Vaheyya, vuyheyya. Vahatu, vuyhatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:200_0: Jara marānaṁ īyaṅa vā hoti māna+nta+tyādīsu. Jīyati. ‘‘Jara sadāna+mīma’’ti īmaāgamo
anya-e0807n5:200_1: lo ca, jīrati. Kamme-jīrīyati jīyīyati. Evaṁ jīyissati jīrissati, jīyīyissati jīrīyissati.
anya-e0807n5:200_2: Ajīyi ajīri, ajīyīyi ajīrīyi. Ajīyissā ajīrissā, ajīyīyissā ajīrīyissā ajīyissā ajīrīyissā
anya-e0807n5:200_3: iccādi. Mara=pāṇacāge, īyaṅa, mīyati marati, mīyanti maranti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:202: 5,124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhāti
anya-e0807n5:203: Ete ādesā disassa vā honti. Anekavaṇṇattā sabbādeso. Passati passanti, dakkhati dakkhanti. Kamme-kye pubbarūpo, dissati dissanti, vipassīyati dakkhīyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:205_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati. Apassi passi,
anya-e0807n5:205_1: apassiṁsu passiṁsu apasso passo, apassittha passittha. Apassiṁ passiṁ, apassimha
anya-e0807n5:205_2: passimha. Tathā adassī dassī, adassiṁsu dassiṁsu iccādi. Anajjatane dasādeso, addasā
anya-e0807n5:205_3: addasa. Addā adda iccādi. Apassissa dakkhissa iccādi. Passeyya dakkheyya, passatu dakkhatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:206: Sada=visaraṇagatyāvasādanādānesu, nipubbo, ‘‘jarasadāna+mīma vā’’ti īmaāgamo. Nisīdati, nisīdanti iccādi. Bhāve-nisajjati, nisajjate.
anya-e0807n5:209_0: Yajassa yassa ṭi+yī honti kānubandheti bahulādhikārā tyādivisayepi kye pubbarūpe
anya-e0807n5:209_1: ca ijjati yijjati mayā buddho. So yajissati, tena ijjissate yijjissate. So yajī ,
anya-e0807n5:209_2: tena ijji yijji. So yajissā, tena ijjissā yijjissā. So yajeyya, tena ijjeyya yijjeyya.
anya-e0807n5:209_3: So yajatu, tena ijjatu yijjatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:210_0: Vada=vacane, ‘‘gamavadā’’ dinā vadassa vajjādeso vā, lassa ‘‘ūlasse’’ti kvaci e ca,
anya-e0807n5:210_1: vajjati vadeti vadati, vajjenti vadenti iccādi. Kamme – ‘‘kyassā’’ti īña, vajjīyati
anya-e0807n5:210_2: vajjati vadīyati, vajjīyanti vajjanti vadīyanti. Vadissati, vadissanti. Avadī vadī,
anya-e0807n5:210_3: avadiṁsu vadiṁsu. Avadissa vadissa. Vajje vajjeyya vade vadeyya, vajjeyyuṁ vadeyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:210_4: Vajjetu vadetu vadatu iccādi yathāgamaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:211_0: Kamu=padavikkhepe, ‘‘parokkhāyañcā’’ti caggahaṇena kama kama iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope
anya-e0807n5:211_1: lavikaraṇe ‘‘kavaggahā’’ dinā kassa ce niggahītāgame ca kate caṁkamati kamati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:211_2: Cala=kampane, caṁcalati. Jala+dala=dittiyaṁ, dvitte daddallati iccādi. (Savuddhikabhūvādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:212: Hū+bhū=sattāyaṁ, tyādīsu ‘‘kattari lo’’ti lo, tassa lope ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye’’ti okāro. So hoti, te honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa iccādi. Bhāve-tena hūyati hūyate.
anya-e0807n5:214: Hūssa heādayo honti ssaccādo. Hessati hehi ssati hohissati.
anya-e0807n5:216_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa vā lopo hoti. Hehiti hehissati, hohiti hohissati.
anya-e0807n5:216_1: Hehinti hehissanti, hohinti hohissanti iccādi. Anajjatane īmhi añāgamo, ‘‘paro kvacī’’ti
anya-e0807n5:216_2: īssa lopo, so ahu. Vuddhimhi ‘‘dīghā īssa’’ iti īssa siādeso, suvo ahosi ānando.
anya-e0807n5:218: Hūto parassa u+miccassa resuṁ vā hoti. Rakārānubandho ‘‘rānubandhentasarādissā’’ti antasarādissa lopo. Ahesuṁ. Okāravuddhi avādese ahavuṁ. Ossa siādese ahosi.
anya-e0807n5:220_0: Imiccassa siña hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṁ. Ñākāro ākhyāvayavattho (ukāro) ikāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0807n5:220_1: ‘‘Aīssā’’ dinā iñāgame tumhe ahosittha, ahosi. Parassaralope rasse ca ahuṁ, ahosimha,
anya-e0807n5:220_2: ahumha, rasso. Bhāve-abhavi, āssatthādeso, abhavittha. Anajjatane āūādipaccaye kate
anya-e0807n5:220_3: ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+miya ṅuvaṅa sare’’ti uvaṅādese ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvo, ahuvattha. Assa amādese
anya-e0807n5:220_4: ahuṁ ahuvaṁ, ahumha iccādi. Bhāve-tena ahuyi ahuyittha. Ahavissā, ahavissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:220_5: Bhāve-ahuyissa, ahuyissatha. Pubbassaralopo, heyya , heyyuṁ iccādi. Bhāve-hūyeyya,
anya-e0807n5:220_6: hūyetha. Hotu, hontu iccādi. Bhāve-hūyatu, hūyataṁ. Anupubbe anubhoti iccādi sabbavāresu
anya-e0807n5:220_7: yojetabbaṁ. Bhāve rūpābhāvā. Kamme-anubhūyati iccādi viseso.
anya-e0807n5:221_0: Si=saye, lassa lopo vuddhi, seti. Ayādese sayati, senti sayanti iccādi. Kamme-atipubbo,
anya-e0807n5:221_1: kye ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti issa dīghe ca kate tena atisīyati, atisīyanti iccādi. Bhāve-tena
anya-e0807n5:222: Nī=pāpane, dvikammako+yaṁ, ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti nayati, nenti nayanti iccādi. Kamme-nīyate gāmaṁ ajo devadattena iccādi. Tathā sesesupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:225: Ṭhāpānaṁ tiṭṭhapivāhonti vā nta+māna+tyādīsu. Lassa lope tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti.
anya-e0807n5:227: Pādito parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho hoti vā. Saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti. Lasse, adhiṭṭheti, adhiṭṭhenti. Kamme –
anya-e0807n5:229_0: Ñādito+ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Upaṭhīyati, upaṭhīyanti. Ṭhahādese
anya-e0807n5:229_1: ‘‘kyassā’’ti īña , tena patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti. Bhāve-īmhi ṭhīyati, ṭhīyate.
anya-e0807n5:229_2: Tathā papubbe patiṭṭhissati patiṭṭhahissati. Īssa simhi aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṁsu, saṇṭhahi,
anya-e0807n5:229_3: saṇṭhahiṁsu. Patiṭṭhissa patiṭṭhahissa. Tiṭṭhe tiṭṭheyya, saṇṭhe saṇṭheyya, saṇṭheyyuṁ,
anya-e0807n5:229_4: saṇṭhahe saṇṭhaheyya. Tiṭṭhatu ṭhātu, saṇṭhahatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:230: Pā=pāne, pivādese pivati. ‘‘Tavaggavaraṇā’’ do ‘‘bayañā’’ti yogavibhāgena vassa bakāro, pibati. Kammepīyati, pīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:233: Atthito parassa tassa tho hoti. Pararūpe paṭhamakkharatakāre ca atthi. ‘‘Nta+māna+nti+yi+yuṁsvā+dilopo’’ti assa lopo, santi.
anya-e0807n5:235: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu. Ṭo sabbādesattho. Tvaṁ asi. Pararūpādimhi kate idāni tumhe attha.
anya-e0807n5:237: Asasmā paresaṁ mimānaṁ mhimhā vā honti taṁsanniyogena asassa aṭa ca. Amhi.
anya-e0807n5:239: Esu mimesu asassa so hoti, pararūpabādhanatthaṁ. Asmi, amha asma. Bhavissatipaccaye –
anya-e0807n5:241_0: Parokkhā a-ādo anajjatana ā-ādo kriyātipattissā-ādo bhavissatissatyādo ca atthissa
anya-e0807n5:241_1: bhu hoti. Ādesavidhānaṁ asassāpayogatthaṁ, kismiñci paccayavisese, tasmā asitabbantiādi
anya-e0807n5:241_2: na bhavati. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavā, abhavu. Kriyātipattiyaṁ bhuādese abhavissa,
anya-e0807n5:243_0: Asa=bhuvi+ccasmā paresaṁ eyyādicchannaṁ sādayo honti yathākkamaṁ. Pararūpe so assa,
anya-e0807n5:243_1: te assu. Tvaṁ assa, tumhe assatha. Ahaṁ assaṁ, mayaṁ assāma. Tvādimhi so atu, assa
anya-e0807n5:243_2: lope santhu, ayādese tvaṁ ahi, tumhe attha. Amhi, amha, sādese asmi asma. Bahulādhikārā
anya-e0807n5:243_3: ajjatane āsi, āsiṁsu, āsuṁ iccādīpi honti.
anya-e0807n5:246: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Vuddhiavādese lassa lope bravīti.
anya-e0807n5:248: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūti. Uvaṅādese brūvanti.
anya-e0807n5:250_0: Āhā paresaṁ ti+antīnaṁ ṭa+ṭū honti. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā. Atoyeva āhā paresaṁ tiantīnaṁ
anya-e0807n5:250_1: ṭaṭūvidhānañāpakā tiantīsu brūssa āho. Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:250_2: Bravissati. Abravi abravī, abravuṁ. Anajjatane abravā, abravu. Parokkhāyaṁ –
anya-e0807n5:252: Brūssa āho hoti parokkhāaādīsu. Supine kira so āha, te āhu iccādi. Abravissa. Brave braveyya. Vuddhippaṭisedhe brūtu, bravantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:253: Hana=hiṁsāyaṁ, timhi vikaraṇalope so hanati hanti. Te hananti iccādi. Kamme-ye nassa ññe pubbarūpaṁ, tena haññati, haññanti haññare. Tathā hanissati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:255: Hanā ssāssa cha+khā vā honti. Paṭihaṁkhāmi paṭihanissāmi. Haṁchema hanissāma. Ahani, ahaniṁsūtiādi sabbattha yojetabbaṁ. Huvādayo
anya-e0807n5:256_0: Hu=havane . Tyādīsu lo. ‘‘Parokkhāyañcā’’ti caggahaṇena hu huti dvittaṁ, ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:256_1: cavaggajā’’ti hassa jo, lalopo vuddhi ca, juhoti aggiṁ, aññatra ‘‘yavā sare’’ti vakāro,
anya-e0807n5:256_2: juhvati. Juhonti. Juhvanti. Juhosi juhvasi, juhotha juhvatha. Iccādi. Kamme – ‘‘dīgho
anya-e0807n5:256_3: sarassā’’ti dīghe hūyati tena aggi iccādi. Juhissati, juhissanti. Ajuhavi ajuhosi,
anya-e0807n5:256_4: ajuhavuṁ ajuhaviṁsu ajuhavaṁsu ajuhosuṁ. Ajuhissa, ajuhissaṁssu. Juhe juheyya. Juhotu, juhontu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:257_0: Hā=cāge, pure viya dvebhāvachādesalope ‘‘rasso pubbassā’’ti pubbassa āssa rasso.
anya-e0807n5:257_1: Jahāti iccādi. Kamme – ‘‘aññādissā+ssī kye’’ti kye āssa ī, hīyati iccādi. Jahissati.
anya-e0807n5:257_2: Ajahāsi, ‘‘dīghā īssa’’ iti si, pajahi, ajahiṁsu ajahaṁsu, pajahiṁsu pajahuṁ. Kamme-pahīyi
anya-e0807n5:258: Dā=dāne, dvibhāvarassattāni, lalopo, dadāti, dadanti iccādi. ‘‘Gamavadā’’ dinā dajjādese dajjati, dajjanti iccādi. Lasse+kāre dānaṁ deti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:260_0: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṁ hoti vā mimesu. Vaggantaṁ, dammi demi, damma dema.
anya-e0807n5:260_1: Īkāre dīyati iccādi. Anāgatatthe iñāgame saraṇopādi, dadissati, dadissanti. Dajjissati,
anya-e0807n5:260_2: dajjissanti. Lavikaraṇe dassati, dassanti. Ajjatane-adadi, adadiṁsu, adajji, adajjiṁsu,
anya-e0807n5:260_3: adāsi, adaṁsu. Anajjatane-adadā, adadu. Kālātipattiyaṁ-adadissa adajjissa, le adassa,
anya-e0807n5:260_4: dassaṁsu. Eyyādimhi-dade dadeyya dajje dajjeyya. ‘‘Ṭā’’ti bahulādhikārā dajjādesā
anya-e0807n5:260_5: parassa eyyassa ṭā, dajjā, dajjuṁ dajjeyyaṁ dadeyyuṁ. Tvādīsu-dadātu, dadantu, dajjatu,
anya-e0807n5:260_6: dajjantu, lasse+kāre detu, dentu iccādi. Sabbattha kammepi yojanīyaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:261_0: Dhā=dhāraṇe, tyādimhi caggahaṇena dvitte pubbākārassa rassatte lalope ‘‘catutthadutiyānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:261_1: tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti pubbadhakārassa dakāre ca kate dadhāti, dadhanti. Pipubbo, ‘‘tadaminā’’
anya-e0807n5:261_2: dinā āssa lopo, ‘‘dhāssa ho’’ti dvitte parassa dhāssa hakāro, dvāraṁ pidahati, pidahanti.
anya-e0807n5:261_3: Lasse+kāre nidheti, nidhenti. Kamme-vidhīyati, vidhīyanti iccādi. Dhassati, pidahissati,
anya-e0807n5:261_4: paridahessati. Adhāsi, pidahi. Adhassa, pidahissa. Dadhe dadheyya, pidahe pidaheyya.
anya-e0807n5:262: Bhūvādi ca juhādi ca, huvādidhātavo ci+me;
anya-e0807n5:265: Adhunā vikaraṇapabhedapakāsanatthaṁ rudhādīnaṁ aṭṭhagaṇānaṁ kānici rūpāni udāhariyante –
anya-e0807n5:268_0: Rudhādiko aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna+nta+tyādīsu lo hoti mañca+ntasarā paro. Niggahītassa
anya-e0807n5:268_1: vaggantaṁ, ‘‘lahussupantassā’’ti saṁyogattā na vuddhi. So maggaṁ rundhati, rundhanti
anya-e0807n5:268_2: iccādi. Kamme-nipubbo kyo dhassa cavagga+pubbarūpa+tatiyakkharajakārā, tena maggo
anya-e0807n5:268_3: nirujjhati iccādi. Iñāgame rundhissati, nirujjhissati. Arundhi, arundhiṁsu. Nirujjhittho,
anya-e0807n5:268_4: nirujjhi, nirujjhiṁsu. Arundhissa, arundhissaṁsu, nirujjhissa, nirujjhissaṁsu. Rundhe
anya-e0807n5:268_5: rundheyya, nirujjhe nirujjheyya. Rundhatu, rundhantu. Tvaṁ rundha rundhāhi. Nirujjhatu, nirujjhantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:269_0: Chida=dvedhākaraṇe, chindati, chindanti. Kamme-chijjati, chijjanti. Bhavissatipaccaye
anya-e0807n5:269_1: – ‘‘labha vasacchidā’’ dinā cchaṅādese checchati chindissati. Kamme-pubbarūpaṁ, chijjissati,
anya-e0807n5:269_2: chijjissanti. Achindi chindi, acchejji, acchejjiṁsu. Acchindissā achijjissā. Chinde
anya-e0807n5:269_3: chindeyya, chijje chijjeyya, chindatu, chindantu, chijjatu, chijjantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:270_1: kkhaṅa’’ti dhātvantena saha ssassa kkhaṅādese vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhuñjissati, bhokkhanti,
anya-e0807n5:271: Muca=mocane, muccati, muccanti iccādi. Kamme-muccati, muccanti iccādi. (Rudhādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:272: Diva=kīḷā vijigiṁsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu,
anya-e0807n5:274_0: Divādīhi kattari lavisaye yaka hoti. Kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho, eva+mupari ca.
anya-e0807n5:274_1: Vassa bakāre pubbarūpaṁ, so jutaṁ dibbati, dibbanti iccādi. Kamme-kye tena dibbati,
anya-e0807n5:274_2: dibbanti iccādi. Dibbissati, tena dibbissati. Adibbi dibbi. Tena adibbi dibbi. Adibbissa.
anya-e0807n5:274_3: Tena adibbissa. Dibbe dibbeyya. Tena dibbe dibbeyya. Dibbatu. Tena dibbatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:275_0: Siva=tantusantāne, sibbati, sibbanti iccādi. Pada=gamane, upubbo, cavaggapubbarūpāni,
anya-e0807n5:275_1: uppajjati, uppajjare uppajjanti iccādi. Kammekye tena paṭipajjate iccādi. Bhāve-uppajjate
anya-e0807n5:275_2: tayā. Budha=avagamane, jhakārapubbarūpāni yakkharesu. Dhammaṁ bujjhati, bujjhare
anya-e0807n5:275_3: bujjhanti iccādi. Kamme-mayā dhammo bujjhate iccādi. Yudha=sampahāre, yujjhati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:275_4: Naha=bandhane, ‘‘hassa vipallāso’’ti ye vipallāso, sannayhati+ccādi. Mana=ñāṇe, ññakāra+pubbarūpāni,
anya-e0807n5:275_5: maññati+ccādi. Tusa=tuṭṭhimhi, pubbarūpe tussati+ccādi. Sama=upasame, sammati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:276_0: Jana=janane , ‘‘janissā’’ti ā hoti kānubandhe bahulādhikārā, so jāyati, jāyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:276_1: Kamme-janituṁ payojetīti ‘‘payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ce’’ti ṇimhi ‘‘aññatrāpī’’ti vuddhipaṭisedhe
anya-e0807n5:276_2: kyamhi ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati, janīyanti iccādi. So jāyissati.
anya-e0807n5:276_3: Tena janissati. So ajāyi, tena ajanīyi. So ajāyissa, tena ajanīyissa. So jāye jāyeyya,
anya-e0807n5:276_4: tena janīyeyya. So jāyatu, tena janīyatu iccādi. (Divādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:279_0: Tudādīhi kattari lavisaye ko hoti. Tudati, tudanti iccādi. Kamme-tudyati tujjati,
anya-e0807n5:279_1: tudyare tudyanti, tujjare tujjanti+ccādi. Tathā tudissati tujjissati. Atudi, atudiṁsu,
anya-e0807n5:279_2: atujji. Atudissa atujjissa, tudeyya tujjeyya. Tudatu, tudantu, tujjatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:280_0: Visa=pavesane, papubbo. So gāmaṁ pavisati iccādi. Kamme-pavisīyati iccādi. Pavisissati.
anya-e0807n5:280_1: Pavisīyissati. Pāvisi, īmhi ‘‘bhujamucā’’ dinā yogavibhāgā kkhaṅa. Pāvisi, pavisi
anya-e0807n5:280_2: pāvekkhi, pathaviṁ pāvisiṁsu pavisiṁsu. Pāvisīyi. Pāvisissa pavisissa. Pāvisīyissa.
anya-e0807n5:280_3: Pavise paviseyya, vikaraṇalopo pavisīyeyya. Pavisatu, pavisīyatu iccādi. Nudati.
anya-e0807n5:283_0: Jyādīhi kattari lavisaye knā hoti. Na vuddhi. Kilese jināti, jinanti. Tena kileso
anya-e0807n5:283_1: jīyati, jīyanti, kye dīgho. Jinissati, jinissanti. Ajini jini. Ajīyi, ajīyittha.
anya-e0807n5:283_2: Ajinissa. Ajīyissa. Jineyya. Jinātu iccādi. Ci=caye, tathā cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:288_0: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, vijānāti iccādi. Kamme-viññāyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:288_1: Kye ‘‘āsse cā’’ti ettha ‘‘āsse’’ti yogavibhāgā āssa e hoti, yassa dvitte ñeyyati,
anya-e0807n5:288_2: ñeyyanti iccādi. Vijānissati, vijānissanti. Kamme – ‘‘kyassa sse’’ti kyalope rasse
anya-e0807n5:288_3: ca kate ñāssati, ñāssanti, viññāyissati, paññāyissati.
anya-e0807n5:290: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti. Añāgame samajāni, saṁjāni, saṁjāniṁsu. Samajā- niṁsu . Kamme-paññāyi, paññāyiṁsu. Ajānissa. Kamme-aññāyissa.
anya-e0807n5:292: Ñāto parassa eyyassa iyā+ñā honti vā. Jāniyā.
anya-e0807n5:294: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṁ vā hoti. Jaññā, jāneyya, jāneyyuṁ. Kamme-paññāyeyya, paññāyeyyuṁ. Vijānātu, vijānanthu. Kamme-viññāyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:295_0: Mā=māne, ‘‘ā ī ssādīnaṁ byañjanassiña’’ iti iñaiti yogavibhāgā iñāgame pubbasaralopo,
anya-e0807n5:295_1: mināti, minanti. Kamme-mīyati iccādi. Lū=chedane, ‘‘kṇāknāsu rasso’’ti dhātussa rasso,
anya-e0807n5:295_2: lunāti, lunanti. Kamme-lūyati iccādi. Dhu=kampane, dhunāti iccādi. (Jyādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:298_0: Kyādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti. ‘‘Kṇāknāsu rasso’’ti rasse kiṇāti, kiṇanti iccādi. Kamme-vikkīyati,
anya-e0807n5:298_1: vikkīyanti. Vikkiṇissati, vikkiṇissanti. Vikkīyissati, vikkīyissanti. Akiṇi, vikkiṇi,
anya-e0807n5:299: Vikkīye . Vikkīyeyya. Vikkiṇātu, vikkiṇantu, vikkīyatu, vikkīyantu iccādi. Su=savane, suṇāti, suṇanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:302: Saka+āpānaṁ kuka+kuiccete āgamā honti ṇe. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Sakkunāti, sakkunanti.
anya-e0807n5:304: Sakasmā kṇāssa kkho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0807n5:306: Sakasmā kṇāssa kho vā hoti īādīsu. Asakkhi sakkhi, sakkhiṁsu. Asakkhissa, asakkhissaṁsu. Sakkuṇe sakkuṇeyya. Sakkuṇātu, sakkuṇantu.
anya-e0807n5:307_0: Apa=pāpuṇane, papubbo, ‘‘sakā+pānaṁ kuka+ku ṇe’’ti kukate sampatti pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti
anya-e0807n5:307_1: iccādi. Kammepāpīyati, pāpīyanti. Pāpuṇissati, pāpuṇissanti. Kamme-pāpīyissati, pāpīyissanti.
anya-e0807n5:307_2: Pāpuṇi, pāpuṇiṁsu. Kamme-pāpīyi, pāpīyittha. Apāpuṇissa. Kamme-apāpīyissa. Pāpuṇe,
anya-e0807n5:307_3: pāpuṇeyya. Kamme-pāpīyeyya. Pāpuṇātu, pāpuṇantu. Kamme-pāpīyatu iccādi. (Kyādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:310_0: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Kānubandhattā na vuddhi. Dhammaṁ suṇoti. Parassaralope
anya-e0807n5:310_1: suṇonti. Kamme-kye dīghe sūyati, sūyanti. Dvitte suyyati suyyanti+ccādi. Iñāgame
anya-e0807n5:310_2: suṇissati, suṇissanti. Kamme-kyalope vuddhi. Sossati, sossanti iccādi. Asuṇi suṇi, asuṇiṁsu suṇiṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:312_0: Tesu īādīsu suto paresaṁ kṇo+kṇānaṁ roṭa vā hoti. Rakāro anubandho. Ṭo sabbādesattho.
anya-e0807n5:312_1: Ussa lope dvittaṁ īssa si ca. Assosi, assosiṁsu. ‘‘Iṁssa ca siña’’ti yogavibhāgā
anya-e0807n5:312_2: siña, assosiṁsu, paccassosuṁ. Asuyi, asuyittha. Asuṇissa, tena asuyissa. Suṇe suṇeyya,
anya-e0807n5:312_3: suṇeyyaṁ. Tena sūye sūyeyya. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Sūyatu, sūyantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:313: Gi=sadde, giṇoti. Giṇanti. Tvaṁ giṇosi. Giṇissati, giṇissanti. Agiṇissa. Giṇeyya. Giṇotu iccādi. Vu=saṁvaraṇe, āvuṇoti, āvuṇanti. Āvuṇosi iccādi. Sesesupi yojetabbaṁ. (Svādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:316: Tanādito kattari lavisaye o hoti. Kittiṁ tanoti, tanonti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:318: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakkavisaye. Tanute, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanvamhe. Kamme –
anya-e0807n5:320_0: Tanassa vā ā hoti kye. Papubbo, patāyati. Pataññati, patāyare patāyanti pataññare
anya-e0807n5:320_1: pataññanti+ccādi. Tathā vikaraṇalope iñāgame ca tanissati, tanissanti. Patāyissati.
anya-e0807n5:320_2: Atani, ataniṁsu. Atanissa. Patāyissa. Taneyya, taneyyuṁ. Tanotu, tanontu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:323: Karassa sa okārassa kubbādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Kubbati, kubbanti. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha.
anya-e0807n5:325_0: Karassa sa okārassa kuṁ vā hoti mimesu. Kummi karomi. Kumma karoma. Paracchakke kurute
anya-e0807n5:325_1: kubbate, kubbante iccādi. Kayirati, kayiranti iccādi. Kamme-kyassa dvitte īssa rasso,
anya-e0807n5:325_2: kariyyati, karīyati vā iccādi. ‘‘Tavaggavaraṇā’’ dinā ye rassa yakāre kayyati, kayyanti.
anya-e0807n5:325_3: Bahulādhakārā kamme kvaci iminā kayirādese tena kayirati, kayiranti iccādi. Bhavissatimhi –
anya-e0807n5:327: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati, kāhanti iccādi. Iñāgame kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Āhaṅādesābhāvapakkhe karissati, karissanti iccādi. Ajjatane –
anya-e0807n5:329: Karassa sa okārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:331_0: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi. Īlope akā, akaṁsu. Ossa siādese akāsi. Siñāgame
anya-e0807n5:331_1: akāsittha. Akāsi, akāsiṁ, akāsimha. Aññatra akarikari, akariṁsu kariṁsu akaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:331_2: Tena akarīyi iccādi. Akarissa iccādi. Kamme-akarīyissa iccādi. Eyyādimhi ‘‘kvaci
anya-e0807n5:331_3: vikaraṇānaṁ’’ti ovikaraṇalope karekareyya, kareyyuṁ iccādi. Kubbe kubbeyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:333: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0807n5:335: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṁ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṁ. Tvaṁ kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0807n5:337_0: Kayirā parasse+thassa ā hotītiādissa essa ā hoti. Kayirātha dhīro. Kamme-kariyeyya,
anya-e0807n5:337_1: kariyeyyu+miccādi. Karotu kurutu vā, kubbantu karontu iccādi. Paracchakke-kurutaṁ,
anya-e0807n5:337_2: kubbantaṁ. Kurussu karassu iccādi. ‘‘Eona+ma vaṇṇe’’ti akāro. Kuruvho, kubbe, kubbāmase.
anya-e0807n5:339_0: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti. Abhisaṅkharoti iccādi. Sabbattha yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:339_1: ‘‘Tadaminā’’dinā khādese abhisaṁkhāsīti viseso. Saka=sattiyaṁ, sakkoti iccādi. Apa=pāpuṇane,
anya-e0807n5:342_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti. ‘‘Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’’ti vikappena lo. Dhanaṁ
anya-e0807n5:342_1: corayati coreti iccādi. Kamme-corīyati iccādi. Corayissati coressati iccādi. Kamme-corīyissati
anya-e0807n5:342_2: iccādi. Acorayi corayi acoresi coresi iccādi. Acorayissa iccādi. Kamme-acorīyissa
anya-e0807n5:342_3: iccādi. Coraye corayeyya iccādi. Coretu corentu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:343_0: Cinta=cintāyaṁ, saṁyogattā na vuddhi, cinteti cintayati, cintenti. Kamme-cintīyati,
anya-e0807n5:343_1: cintīyanti iccādi. Manta=guttabhāsane, manteti mantayati iccādi. Pāla=rakkhaṇe, so
anya-e0807n5:344: Bhūvādi ca rudhādi ca, divādi ca tudādayo;
anya-e0807n5:345: Jyādī kiyādī svādī ca, tanādī ca curādayo.
anya-e0807n5:348_0: Khantiyaṁ tijā, vīmaṁsāyaṁ mānā ca kha+sapaccayā honti yathākkamaṁ. Tija=nisāne,
anya-e0807n5:348_3: dinā paṭhamakkharakakāre ca ‘‘khachasāna+mekassaro+di dve’’ti tikkha tikkha iti dvibhāve
anya-e0807n5:348_4: ‘‘lopo+nādibyañjanassā’’tiādito+ññassa byañjanassa lope ca kate titikkhādhātuto tyādipaccaya+lavikaraṇāni.
anya-e0807n5:348_5: Titikkhati iccādi purimasamaṁ . Kamme-titikkhīyati iccādi. Ito paraṁ kammodāharaṇaṁ na karissāma.
anya-e0807n5:349_0: Māna=pūjāyaṁ+timasmā sapaccaya, dvittādimhi kate ‘‘mānassa vī parassa ca maṁ’’ti
anya-e0807n5:349_1: pubbamānassa vī ca paramānassa mañca hoti. Vīmaṁsadhātuto tipaccayādimhi kate vīmaṁsati
anya-e0807n5:349_2: iccādi. Titikkhissati, vīmaṁsissati iccādi. Eva+muparipi ajjatanādīsupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:349_3: Payojakattā ṇi, ‘‘ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’’ti lavikaraṇaṁ, tejayati tejeti. Tathā curādittā
anya-e0807n5:351_0: Tikicchāyaṁ saṁsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti. Kita=nivāse, chapaccaye pubbeva pararūpādimhi
anya-e0807n5:351_1: ca kate ‘‘kitassā+saṁsaye vā’’ti dvitte pubbassa tiādese tikicchadhātuto tyādayo.
anya-e0807n5:351_2: Tikicchati, tikicchanti+ccādi. Vipubbato kitā chappaccayādimhi kate ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:351_3: cavaggajā’’ti dvitte pubbassa kassa co. Vicikicchati, vicikicchanti+ccādi. Payojakattā
anya-e0807n5:353_0: Nindāyaṁ gupa+badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca. Gupa=rakkhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye ‘‘aññatrāpī’’ti
anya-e0807n5:353_1: ottābhāve ca pararūpādimhi ‘‘kavaggahā’’ dinā gassa je ca kate ‘‘gupissussā’’ti dvitte
anya-e0807n5:353_2: pubbassa ussa i hoti. Tyādi+lavikaraṇādimhi jigucchati iccādi. Nindāyaṁ-badha=bandhane+tīmasmā
anya-e0807n5:353_3: chappaccaye ca imināva bassa bhakāre ca pararūpe paṭhamakkhare bhacchabhacchaiti
anya-e0807n5:353_4: dvitte anādibyañjanassa lope ‘‘catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti dvitte pubbassa
anya-e0807n5:353_5: bhassa bakāre ‘‘khachasesvassī’’ti ikāre dīghe ca kate bībhacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:355_0: Tumantato icchāya+matthe te kha+sa+chā honti bahulaṁ, tuṁpaccayassa lopo ca hoti,
anya-e0807n5:355_2: ‘‘lahussupantassā’’ti okāre pararūpe ca kate bhottu+micchatīti viggayha iminā khapaccaye
anya-e0807n5:355_3: tuṁpaccayassa iminā ca lope ‘‘nimittābhāve nemittikassāpi ca abhāvo’’ti ñāyā pararūpaokārānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:355_4: abhāve khassa pararūpa+khakārādimhi ca kate bhukkha bhukkha iti dvitte tatiyabakāro
anya-e0807n5:355_5: hoti, bubhukkhadhātuto tyādayo honti, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:356_0: Ji=jaye, jayanāya iti viggayha pure viya tumādimhi kate jetu+micchatīti viggayha
anya-e0807n5:356_1: sappaccaye jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope dvitte parassa jissa ‘‘jiharānaṁ
anya-e0807n5:356_2: giṁ’’ti giṁ. Jigiṁsadhātuto tyādīsu jigiṁsati, jigiṁsanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:357_0: Ghasa=adane , ghasitu+micchati chappaccayādimhi pure viya kate ghassa ‘‘kavaggahā’’dinā
anya-e0807n5:357_1: jhe jhassa ‘‘catutthadutiyā’’ dinā jakāre ‘‘khachasesvassī’’ti ikāre ca kate jighacchadhātuto
anya-e0807n5:359: Icchākammato icchāya+matthe īyapaccayo hoti. Putta+micchatīti īyapaccaye īyādivuttittā ‘‘ekatthatāyaṁ’’ti vibhattilopo. Puttīyati, puttīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:361: Kammato upamānā ācāratthe īyo hoti. Putta+mivā+carati puttīyati sissaṁ, puttīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:363: Īyo hoti. Kuṭiya+mivā+carati kuṭīyati pāsāde. Pāsādevā+carati pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṁ, pāsādīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:365: Kattuto+pamānā ācāratthe āyo hoti. Pabbato ivā+carati sīlādiguṇayogatoti pabbatāyati yogī, pabbatāyadhātuto tyādayo.
anya-e0807n5:367_0: Kattuto abhūtatabbhāve āyo hoti bahulaṁ. Bhusoti paṭhamantato abhuso bhuso bhavatīti
anya-e0807n5:367_1: bhusāyati, bhusāyanti iccādi. ‘‘Vicchābhikkhaññesu dve’’ti ābhikkhaññatthe dvitte
anya-e0807n5:367_2: apaṭapaṭā paṭapaṭā bhavatīti āye paṭapaṭāyati, paṭapaṭāyanti+ccādi. Alohito lohito bhavati lohitāyati.
anya-e0807n5:369: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṁ atthe āyo hoti. Saddaṁ karoti saddāyati. Evaṁ verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:371: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṁ atthe asso hoti. Namo karotīti asmiṁ atthe assapaccaye tyādayo honti, tathāgataṁ namassati, namassanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:373_0: Nāmasmā dhātvatthe bahula+mi hoti. Hatthinā atikkamatīti ipaccaye lavikaraṇa+ekāra+ayādesesu
anya-e0807n5:373_1: katesu atihatthayati. Evaṁ vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇāyati, vinayaṁ daḷhaṁ karoti daḷhayati,
anya-e0807n5:373_2: visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhāyati, kusalaṁ pucchati kusalāyati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:375_0: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti. Sacca+mācikkhatīti āpimhi tyādipaccaye ‘‘ṇi+ṇāpyā+dīhi
anya-e0807n5:375_1: vā’’ti lavikaraṇa+e+ayādesā. Saccāpayati, saccāpeti iccādi. Attha+mācikkhati atthāpayati.
anya-e0807n5:375_2: Evaṁ vedāpayati. Sukkhaṁ karotīti sukkhāpayati sukkhāpeti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:377: Kattāraṁ yo payojeti, tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi+ṇāpī honti bahulaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:379: Dve dve+ko hoti vā sese, bahulaṁtyanuvuttiyā.
anya-e0807n5:382: Tasmā kattari kamme ca, ṇi+ṇāpīnaṁ tu sambhavo;
anya-e0807n5:383: Na bhāve suddhakattā tu, kammaṁ hoti payojake.
anya-e0807n5:386_0: Bhavituṁ payojayatīti atthe iminā ṇippaccayo. Ṇakāro ṇānubandhakāriyattho. ‘‘Yuvaṇṇāna+me+o
anya-e0807n5:386_1: paccaye’’ti okāre ‘‘āyā+vā ṇānubandhe’’ti ṇānubandhe āvādeso. Tyādimhi ‘‘ṇi+ṇāpyā+pīhi
anya-e0807n5:386_2: vā’’ti lavikaraṇe ekāre ‘‘eona+mayavā sare’’ti ayādeso. So samādhiṁ bhāvayati bhāveti
anya-e0807n5:386_3: , bhāvayanti bhāventi+ccādi. Kamme-tena samādhi bhāvīyati+ccādi. Ettha ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti
anya-e0807n5:386_4: kye ikārassa dīgho. Bhāvayissati bhāvessati, bhāvayissanti bhāvessanti+ccādi. Ajjatane
anya-e0807n5:386_5: īssa simhi abhāvesi bhāvesi, abhāvayi bhāvayi, abhāvayiṁsu bhāvayiṁsu. Parassaralope
anya-e0807n5:386_6: abhāvesuṁ bhāvesuṁ, abhāvayaṁsu bhāvayaṁsu, abhāvayuṁ bhāvayuṁ iccādi. Kamme-abhāvīyi
anya-e0807n5:386_7: bhāvīyi iccādi. Abhāvissa abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṁsu abhāvayissaṁsu. Kamme-abhāvayissaṁ
anya-e0807n5:386_8: iccādi. Bhāve bhāveyya iccādi. Kamme-bhāvīyeyya iccādi. Bhāvayatu bhāvetu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:387_0: Pacituṁ payojetīti atthe ṇi+ṇāpī honti. So devadattena odanaṁ pācayati pāceti iccādi,
anya-e0807n5:387_1: tathā pācāpayati pācāpeti+ccādi. Kamme-so tena devadattena odano pācīyati pācāpīyati+ccādi,
anya-e0807n5:388: Gantuṁ payojetīti atthe so taṁ purisaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati gameti gacchāpayati gacchāpeti+ccādi. Kamme-tena so gāmaṁ gamīyati gacchāpīyati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:389: Guha=saṁvaraṇe, guhituṁ payojetīti ṇimhi ‘‘guhissa sare’’ti dīgho. Gūhayati, gūhayanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:390: Disa+dusa=appītiyaṁ, dusituṁ payojetīti ṇimhi ‘‘ṇimhi dīgho dusassā’’ti dīghe dūsayati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:391_0: Tathā icchantaṁ payojayati icchāpayati icchāpeti, esayati eseti. Niyacchantaṁ payojayati
anya-e0807n5:391_1: niyamayati niyameti. Tathā āsayati āseti, acchāpayati acchāpeti. Lābhayati lābheti,
anya-e0807n5:391_2: evaṁ vāsayati vāseti, vāsāpayati vāsāpeti. Vāhayati vāheti, vāhāpayati vāhāpeti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:391_3: Evaṁ jīrayati, mārayati, dassayati iccādi. Hū=sattāyaṁ, pahontaṁ payojayati pahāvayati
anya-e0807n5:391_4: pahāveti iccādi. Sāyayati sāyāpayati sāyāpeti. Nāyāpayati nāyāpeti. Patiṭṭhāpayati
anya-e0807n5:391_5: patiṭṭhāpeti. Rasse patiṭṭhapeti. Hantuṁ payojayatīti ṇi+ṇāpī, ‘‘hanassa ghāto ṇānubandhe’’ti
anya-e0807n5:391_6: ghātādese ghātayati ghāteti. Tathā juhāvayati juhāveti, jahāpayati jahāpeti. Hāpayati
anya-e0807n5:391_7: hāpeti. Dāpayati dāpeti. Vidhāpayati vidhāpeti, pidahāpayati pidahāpeti. (Bhūvādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:392_0: Idāni rudhādiaṭṭhagaṇā dassīyante-rodhayati rodheti. Devayati deveti. Todayati todeti.
anya-e0807n5:392_1: Jayāpayati jayāpeti. Vikkayati vikkayāpeti. Sāvayati sāveti. Vitānayati vitāneti.
anya-e0807n5:395_0: Titikkhantaṁ payojayati titikkheti titikkhāpeti, tikicchayati tikiccheti tikicchāpayati
anya-e0807n5:395_1: tikicchāpeti. Evaṁ bubhukkheti bubhukkhāpeti. Pabbatāyayati. Puttīyayati iccādi. (Khādipaccayanayo).
